name: Invalid email credential registration
description: Using 'invalid email' credentials - new user registration is not possible when no valid email address is provided
descriptionHtml: Using 'invalid email' credentials - new user registration is not possible when no valid email address is provided

labels.name: epic
labels.value: '-Register' and '-Login' functions - These tests covers the validation of features accessible directly from https://lennertamas.github.io/roxo/index.html url. Also verifies the url is correct.

labels.name: story
labels.value: Invalid email credential - User registers a new user with invalid email credential.
